001package edu.cnm.deepdive.chat.configuration;
002
003import java.util.List;
004import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
005import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Value;
006import org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean;
007import org.springframework.context.annotation.Configuration;
008import org.springframework.context.annotation.Profile;
009import org.springframework.core.convert.converter.Converter;
010import org.springframework.security.authentication.AbstractAuthenticationToken;
011import org.springframework.security.config.annotation.web.builders.HttpSecurity;
012import org.springframework.security.config.annotation.web.configuration.EnableWebSecurity;
013import org.springframework.security.config.http.SessionCreationPolicy;
014import org.springframework.security.oauth2.core.DelegatingOAuth2TokenValidator;
015import org.springframework.security.oauth2.core.OAuth2TokenValidator;
016import org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt;
017import org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.JwtClaimNames;
018import org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.JwtClaimValidator;
019import org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.JwtDecoder;
020import org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.JwtDecoders;
021import org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.JwtValidators;
022import org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.NimbusJwtDecoder;
023import org.springframework.security.web.SecurityFilterChain;
024
025@Configuration
026@EnableWebSecurity
027@Profile("service")
028public class SecurityConfiguration {
029
030  private final Converter<Jwt, ? extends AbstractAuthenticationToken> converter;
031  private final String issuerUri;
032  private final String clientId;
033
034  @Autowired
035  public SecurityConfiguration(
036      Converter<Jwt, ? extends AbstractAuthenticationToken> converter,
037      @Value("${spring.security.oauth2.resourceserver.jwt.issuer-uri}") String issuerUri,
038      @Value("${spring.security.oauth2.resourceserver.jwt.client-id}") String clientId
039  ) {
040    this.converter = converter;
041    this.issuerUri = issuerUri;
042    this.clientId = clientId;
043  }
044
045  @Bean
046  public SecurityFilterChain provideFilterChain(HttpSecurity security) throws Exception {
047    return security
048        .sessionManagement((session) ->
049            session.sessionCreationPolicy(SessionCreationPolicy.STATELESS))
050        .authorizeHttpRequests((auth) -> auth.anyRequest().authenticated())
051        .oauth2ResourceServer((oauth) ->
052            oauth.jwt((jwt) -> jwt.jwtAuthenticationConverter(converter)))
053        .build();
054  }
055
056  @Bean
057  public JwtDecoder provideDecoder() {
058    NimbusJwtDecoder decoder = JwtDecoders.fromIssuerLocation(issuerUri);
059    OAuth2TokenValidator<Jwt> audienceValidator =
060        new JwtClaimValidator<List<String>>(JwtClaimNames.AUD, (aud) -> aud.contains(clientId));
061    OAuth2TokenValidator<Jwt> issuerValidator = JwtValidators.createDefaultWithIssuer(issuerUri);
062    OAuth2TokenValidator<Jwt> combinedValidator =
063        new DelegatingOAuth2TokenValidator<>(audienceValidator, issuerValidator);
064    decoder.setJwtValidator(combinedValidator);
065    return decoder;
066  }
067
068}
